title: Heterojunction Bipolar Transistors for Circuit Design
description:
A highly comprehensive summary on circuit related modeling techniques and parameter extraction methods for heterojunction bipolar transistors

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Heterojunction Bipolar Transistor (HBT) is one of the most important devices for microwave applications. The book details the accurate device modeling for HBTs and high level IC design using HBTs
